entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
